name: react-simple-chat
description: Simple chat web client built using React JS
author: sdarmaputra <Surya Darma Putra>

scripts.test: mocha --require babel-register --require ignore-styles --require testSetup.js --recursive src/components src/containers
scripts.test:watch: mocha --require babel-register --require ignore-styles --require testSetup.js --recursive -w --watch-extensions js src/components src/containers
